message: Hello Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm willing to sell this valuable product to you for $12000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer the product to you for $11000. It's a fair price, considering the value it holds for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9000?

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob. However, I need to make a profit. I can offer you a slight discount, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I can sell the product to you for $10500. It's a good compromise, considering the value it holds for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8500?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $10000. It's the lowest price I'm willing to go, considering the value it holds for you.
I really appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm trying to stay as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $8000?
